definition: (romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
to feel attached to/to long for/to love
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to court/to go steady/to be dating

sentences.english: When you are in love, what in your eyes are all happy singles.
sentences.chinese: 當你戀愛的時候，你看到的都是快樂的單身族。

sentences.english: If women are clean water, the ones who have fallen in love time after time are footbath water.
sentences.chinese: 如果說女人是水，那麼戀愛多次的女人就象洗腳水。

sentences.english: The stage is more beholding to love, than the life of man.
sentences.chinese: 舞臺較人生受惠於戀愛者爲多。

sentences.english: Was this a lover, or a lecher whether?
sentences.chinese: 誰知這究竟是戀愛，還是瞎胡鬧？

sentences.english: We've only been dating two days; it's nowhere near a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 我們才談了兩個月的戀愛，還談不上結婚的事。

sentences.english: We encourage normal intercourse, and oppose love triangles.
sentences.chinese: 我們鼓勵正常的交往，反對三角戀愛。

sentences.english: A: I didn't know Anthony and Cicely were dating.
sentences.chinese: 我沒聽說安東尼和西塞莉在談戀愛啊。

sentences.english: Love is a kind of very elegant thing to can improve the value of life.
sentences.chinese: 戀愛原是一種可以提高生命價值的很華貴的東西。

sentences.english: A love triangle of the most grotesque kind.
sentences.chinese: 最荒誕不經的一種三角戀愛。

sentences.english: That's the average relationship in human history.
sentences.chinese: 這就是人類史上的普通戀愛關係。

sentences.english: With Meher Baba's great love in our hearts, external disasters can't harm us.
sentences.chinese: 有美赫巴巴之大戀愛藏在內心中，無外災可傷害。

sentences.english: The "in love" feeling is euphoric, and it is quite reinforcing.
sentences.chinese: 戀愛的感覺就是一種欣快感，對人的強化作用非常大。

sentences.english: Youth sees him on a job and in love.
sentences.chinese: 進入青年期，他工作了，戀愛了。

sentences.english: A man in love in the most can show nature noble qualities.
sentences.chinese: 一個人在戀愛時最能表現出天性中崇高的品質。

sentences.english: When romantic love is thwarted, the lover just love harder.
sentences.chinese: 當戀愛受挫，那些人只是愛得更加沉重。

sentences.english: What if he only studies the average?
sentences.chinese: 如果他只研究普通的戀愛關係呢？

definition: to court/to go steady/to be dating
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
counterpart/other person involved/opposite side/other side/receiving party
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
blind date/arranged interview to evaluate a proposed marriage partner (Taiwan pr. [xiang4 qin1])/to be deeply attached to each other
